text: The following is a list of notable events and releases of the year 1881 in Norwegian music. ==Events== ==Deaths== ==Births== ; May * 7 – Edvard Sylou- Creutz, classical pianist, composer and radio personality (died 1945). ; August * 27 – Sigurd Islandsmoen, composer and painter (died 1964). * 28 – Arne Eggen, composer and organist (died 1955). ==See also== * 1881 in Norway * Music of Norway ==References== Category:Norwegian music Norwegian Music Category:1880s in Norwegian music
title: 1881 in Norwegian music
